title: bundle
description: A bundle is a collection of STIX Objects grouped together to enable them to be exchanged across interoperable systems.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `bundle`.

spec_version.description: The version of the STIX specification used to represent the content in this bundle.

attack_patterns.description: Specifies a set of one or more Attack Patterns.

campaigns.description: Specifies a set of one or more Campaigns.

courses_of_action.description: Specifies a set of one or more Courses of Action that could be taken in regard to one of more cyber threats.

incidents.description: Specifies a set of one or more cyber threat Incidents.

indicators.description: Specifies a set of one or more cyber threat Indicators.

intrusion_sets.description: Specifies a set of one or more cyber threat Intrusion Sets.

malware.description: Specifies a set of one or more Malware TTPs.

marking_definitions.description: Specifies a set of one or more Marking Definitions.

observed_data.description: Specifies a set of one or more piece of Observed Data.

relationships.description: Specifies a set of one or more relationships between SDOs.

reports.description: Specifies a set of one or more reports.

sightings.description: Specifies a set of one or more sightings.

sources.description: Specifies a set of one or more individual or organizational sources.

threat_actors.description: Specifies a set of one or more Threat Actors.

tools.description: Specifies a set of one or more Tools.

victim_targets.description: Specifies a set of one or more Victim Targets.

vulnerabilities.description: Specifies a set of one or more Vulnerabilities.

custom_objects.description: Specifies a list of one or more custom objects.
